disabledDurabilityTooltip._comment: Set to true to disable the durability tooltip on hammers

durabilityRepairPercentage._comment: The percentage of durability restored per repair item

durabilityRepairPercentageNetherite._comment: The percentage of durability restored per repair item for netherite hammers
